trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> class has no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> classe não tem construtor público.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> method to add an image and obtain a reference to it in a new document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> método para adicionar uma imagem e obter uma referência a ele em um novo documento.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A> method to obtain an image reference in an existing document.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageReader.GetImage%2A> método para obter uma referência de imagem em um documento existente.

trans-unit.source: Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> class may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
trans-unit.target: Com base nas configurações de <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, como <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> e <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, a operação de liberação do <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource.Commit%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> classe pode ser atrasada até a conclusão <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to add images to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como adicionar imagens a um <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
